enWisdom: Knowledge is the most excellent honour
Knowledge is the root of every good
Knowledge is the most excellent honour
Knowledge is the killer of ignorance

Indeed fire is not diminished by what is taken from it but is extinguished when it does not find firewood; similarly, knowledge is not depleted by being acquired but the miserliness of those who possess it is the cause of its absence
The completeness of knowledge is [in] its application

Wisdom: تَعَلَّمُوا الْعِلْمَ وَتَعَلَّمُوا مَعَ الْعِلْمِ السَّكِينَةَ وَالْحِلْمَ فَإِنَّ الْعِلْمَ خَلِيلُ الْمُؤْمِنِ وَالْحِلْمَ وَزِيرُهُ

enWisdom: The excellence of knowledge is [in] acting upon it

Wisdom: لَنْ يُثْمِرَ الْعِلْمُ حَتَّى يُقَارِنَهُ الْحِلْمُ
enWisdom: None will attain knowledge except the one who lengthens his [period of] study
How good a companion of forbearance knowledge is!
The dignity of forbearance is the adornment of knowledge
Obey knowledge and disobey ignorance, [for by doing this] you will be successful

Wisdom: لَا شَيْ‏ءَ أَحْسَنُ مِنْ عَقْلٍ مَعَ عِلْمٍ وَعِلْمٍ مَعَ حِلْمٍ وَحِلْمٍ مَعَ قُدْرَةٍ
enWisdom: There is nothing better than an intellect with knowledge, and knowledge with forbearance, and forbearance with power [to punish]
